content: this pattern is available in english with us crochet terminology no other languages are available as a pdf there are no returns on digital files the white version was made with lion brand diy glow while the pink and beige ones were made with lion brand coboo the pdf is available as an instant download with 4 pages including * written pattern in us terms * photo tutorial * a video tutorial is available on youtube please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/tulip-lanyard/ please contact me if you have questions about the pattern find me on social media patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
